mapper.select: select m.id,m.name,m.name_en,m.f_id,m.has_submenu,url,p.admin_id from t_manage_menu m INNER JOIN t_admin_permission p on (p.menu_id = m.id or p.menu_id = m.f_id) and p.admin_id = #{admin_id} where m.isshow = 1 order by m.f_id,m.sort asc
